name: Hilton Garden Inn Newburgh/Stewart Airport

reviews.text: I just completed a 20-night stay at this hotel. The location is convenient--there are plenty of restaurants in the area, there is a mall nearby and a Wal-Mart, too. Orange County Choppers is next door, and I walked over there several evenings for dinner and looked at all of the amazing bikes. The hotel staff was very helpful. There was a problem with the fan on the heating unit in my room. The maintenance mechanic fixed it quickly. What really impressed me was the next day he saw me in the lobby, recognized me, and asked if everything was satisfactory. All of the staff were helpful like that. Edith in housekeeping was very thoughtful. There is plenty of free coffee, tea bags, and hot water. The breakfast looked nice, but I never tried it because I thought it was a little pricey.
reviews.title: Convenient Location, helpful staff

reviews.text: Just a warning to those who are sensitive to cigarette smoke: there are some smoking rooms on the ground floor of the hotel, near the laundry room. I wanted a room close to a side door, because I have a lot of things to load into my car everyday that I need for my work. Cigarette smoke doesn't bother me, and it was worth putting up with the smell to have a room close to a side door. But if you're bothered by cigarette smoke, be sure to reserve a room far away from the laundry room. Oh, and if you're planning to do laundry during your stay ... there is not a vending machine with those little boxes of detergent and fabric softener, so you'll have to buy soap from the nearby Wal-Mart.
reviews.title: Filthy Room: Urine Soaked Floor

reviews.text: Overall, this is a nice hotel for a long stay, with a small refrigerator and microwave in the room. The room has a nice big desk and comfortable work chair, as well as a cozy upholstered chair and foot rest if you have some time to relax and read.
reviews.title: Worth the stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is far from my first time at this hotel and each time I wonder why in the world I bothered to give this place another chance. They've certainly outdone themselves this time with a giant puddle of dried urine on the bathroom floor; plus 4 pubic hairs and dirt smears. Good thing they switched me to a stinky room that smells like stale cigarettes. Can't wait to sleep on their rock hard beds.
reviews.title: Lovely place

reviews.text: This is probably one of the best hotels to stay in that is near Stewart AFB. As a government contractor I travel all over the US in support of my job so finding a good hotel is high on my list of travel plans. The convenience of this hotel makes it worth the stay and don't forget it is right next door to Orange County Choppers (OCC) for you bike enthusiasts which also has an awesome cafe/bar with karaoke. Will definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Exceeded my Expectationd

reviews.text: As soon as you enter the lobby you'll know you made the right choice. It's clean and well decorated and has a warm atmosphere. The staff are very friendly and helpful. Breakfast is available for $9.95 and was very good. If you're in the area this is the place to stay.
reviews.title: New, Super Clean Hotel with an Excellent Staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: By the way, Orange County Choppers are next door and have a showroom and restaurant. We were not in the area for that but if you are then the Hilton is the best place to stay--you could walk across the parking lot...Also near the ANG base and airport...
reviews.title: Clean, Comfortable, and Inexpensive!

reviews.text: My wife and I stayed here after going to the 2012 Pinstripe Bowl. We didn't check in until 9PM, but the staff was very courteous and gave us some recommendations on where we could eat. The room was clean and comfortable. It is located right next to the Orange County Chopper facility and there are several plazas and restaurants in the area. My only complaint was that the heating unit, as most hotel units are, was very noisy. I had to turn it off to get any sleep. Thankfully, the room didn't cool down too much overnight.
reviews.title: First rate as always!

reviews.text: Just another Hilton Garden Inn....
reviews.title: Fantastic place to stay!

reviews.text: Meaning super clean, nicely furnished, great staff and all around excellent stay.
reviews.title: Business stay at the Newburgh Garden Inn

reviews.text: Pleased with stay here for a business meeting. Best part was the comfy bed. Meeting room was chilly, but otherwise very nice. Staff were helpful. Appreciated hotel shuttle to and from the airport. Food was average but plentiful.
reviews.title: Good value

reviews.text: The hotel is very clean and well maintained. The full service breakfast is a plus. The staff is curteous and helpful. Overall a good value for the area and the services provided. Great location, easy to find and close to airport with shuttle service.
reviews.title: Near OCC

reviews.text: This is a quiet location convenient to Stewart Field Airport and Major Highways. Hospitality and guest accommodations are Excellent. Property and facilities are in excellent condition, and well maintained. Entire Staff is friendly and accommodating. Restaurant food and service are superb. Truly was a good experience and value.
reviews.title: A Gem in Newburgh NY

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Right next door for anyone visiting OCC makes this a great hotel location. Location of several crossroads makes it a great location as well. Hotel serves nice breakfast which the OCC Cafe doesn't do, so you don't have to leave the hotel and drive somewhere to eat in the morning.
reviews.title: Good Location Right By OCC

reviews.text: I'd never stayed in a Garden Hilton - the price is right and the quality and staff were excellent. STay there again - I would. This is near enough New Paltz that you can drive there in 15-20 minutes - and much much more reasonable than nearby B&Bs. Good place.
reviews.title: Great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: HGIs are our fave and we've stayed at lots of them. Spent a nice weekend at one of the best. Large, clean room with comfy beds; friendly, helpful staff; tidy, pleasant public areas; convenient, quiet location; good breakfast selections prepared to order (no steam table warmed-over food). Dinner at Orange County Choppers next door one night and Alexis Diner another night - both quite good. We wouldn't stay anywhere else in the Newburgh area if we're back that way!
reviews.title: HGI Does It Again!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms were quiet, staff was friendly, would reccommend. I stayed for a friends wedding and they did a great job hosting us. It was a little difficult to get to off of the high way, if your GPS is not updated.
reviews.title: Nice quiet/ friendly hotel

reviews.text: Staff here are great. always friendly and very helpful. Food is great, Bar staff are always friendly. I have alot of choices of places to stay in this arear and i always choose the Hilton Garden Inn here in Newburgh NY.
reviews.title: Hotel Stay

reviews.text: Comfortable and very clean rooms with excellent service. Food mediocre. Staff friendly. Will stay again and hope that meals improve. Wonderful hotel within walking distance of OCC (Orange County Choppers). Front desk could not have been more helpful in suggestions of sites to visit in nearby area.
reviews.title: Good location for business travelers.

reviews.text: Very comforable beds and very clean rooms with excellent service. Breakfast bar had nice assortment of foods. Wonderful hotel within walking distance of OCC (Orange County Choppers). Front desk could not have been more helpful in suggestions of sites to visit in nearby area.
reviews.title: Truly great experience.

aka: Hilton Garden Inn Newburgh/Stewart Airport Hotel
